opinion:
BRIDGEPORT HOSPITAL v. COLMAN, 30 Conn. App. 913 (1993) 619 A.2d 1160 BRIDGEPORT HOSPITAL v. FRANK COLMAN ET AL. (11553)Appellate Court of Connecticut
LAVERY, HEIMAN and SCHALLER, Js.
Argued February 8, 1993
Decision released March 2, 1993
Action to recover moneys allegedly due for services rendered to the defendants, brought to the Superior Court in the judicial district of Fairfield, where the court, Lewis, J., granted the plaintiff's motion for summary judgment and rendered judgment thereon, from which the defendants appealed to this court. Affirmed.
Kathryn L. Braun, with whom, on the brief, was Laurence v. Parnoff, for the appellants (defendants).
Irwin J. Gordon, for the appellee (plaintiff).
PER CURIAM.
The judgment is affirmed.
